context_text: <A> yeah i don't get into the easter bunny i don't get into and i don't tell them their is an easter bunny i basically tell them about uhm the resurrection of christ and this is the reason we celebrate them now i don't keep them from going easter egg hunting or anything / <B> right / <A> you know but and and even as far as uh christmas i don't keep them from watching cartoons but i try to keep it more on the real basis because um i'm just i just never served figured the purpose of ha- you know telling them about santa clause because you know usually they know and you know children are pretty bright and pretty smart now { so } / <B> [ right ] / <A> you know we don't eh really too much get into that now you know like i said my husband will tell them you know look you know and he may we might even write them a little note that says from santa but pretty much they know that really there's no santa { you } / <B> [ right ] / <A> know but this is just part of what we do around christmas or what people do around christmas but this is not the foundation this is just something that's added to make fun you know so you guys can enjoy your holidays / <B> right / <A> but we don't get into you know the seriousness because when i coming up i really did think there was a santa clause because they were so devout of telling us about santa clause more so than they told us about jesus so i never really understood the reason for christmas i thought it was gifts santa clause bringing gifts / <B> right / <A> and i just don't want that to be my children's idea a and and understanding of christmas you know but i don't i don't like oh no you know go crazy if you know they hear santa clause or whatever or you know if my husband mentioned it to them because they know the real truth of christmas is to celebrate christ's birthday i mean everything else just added is just you know man-made to have a to kind of you know bring a little spice and enjoy christmas / <B> right
